title: This video mode can not be displayed
body: With this new client I get this  **"This video mode can not be displayed"** and my monitor turning black.   Please help {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
This is a known issue for some players that's currently being investigated, per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  In the meantime, you can try pressing Alt+Enter in-game as a workaround or a manual method:

Log in to League of Legends
Browse to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and open "Game.cfg" in notepad or any other text editor
Find this line: WindowMode=X
Change the "X" to 2. IE: WindowMode=2
Save this, then launch a custom game

I hope that helps!
no this did not help didn't sort my issue anyone using a usb keyboard is screwed
